name: River Road Bridge Builder: Construction Simulator
name_original: River Road Bridge Builder: Construction Simulator
description:
Get ready for the latest river road bridge builder game of 2017. It's time to put that hat on and act as a heavy excavator operator in this river road construction simulator game. You are given a construction contract from a famous construction company. This company has given you a contract of joining two cities separated by a long river. The connection between these cities are very important as trade and transportation will become very easy by this bridge. Before this construction people have to pass a whole mountain to pass that river. As river bridge is in another town. Now you are a construction engineer and this company assign this difficult job to you as you are the best construction engineer in the town. Now its time to build a bridge for the ease of people. Get your work done as construction instructions are given to you.

Dare yourself to become part of this heavy machinery mayhem. Take care of Safety while completing your missions in time. Dare yourself to become part of this heavy machinery mayhem. Once again we bring the fun & thrilling smooth 3D action simulation adventure to you.

Features:

• Easy Heavy Crane Digger Handling
• Perfect Construction Simulator Game
• Construction Simulator with River Road Building task
• Become a Crane Operator
• Detailed river road bridge Construction
• Enhanced 3D Graphics
• Super Duper Realistic Sounds
